name: Crystal Miner
description:
Welcome to Crystal Miner, a game where you can make money by upgrading and selling crystals using various machines with special abilites!

This game is a Unity remake of a Scratch project I made. It is currently in development, so feedback to improve the game would be appreciated.

Controls:

Q - Sell machine (on hover)

E - Upgrade machine (on hover)

F- Toggle shop
